Header: Doubles win gives Germany unassailable 3-0 Davis Cup lead over Hungary
Content: Germany won the Davis Cup doubles rubber over Hungary to go into an unassailable 3-0 lead and ensure qualification for the finals. Tim Puetz and Jan-Lennard Struff comfortably beat the Hungarian pair Gabor Borsos and Peter Nagy 6-2 6-3 in just one hour 10 minutes to send Germany through to the revamped finals which will be held in Miami in November.
